participant_1.background:
I like to eat food from my parents' home country.
I'm not married, but I love my new sweater.
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
the death of kurt cobain marred my middle school years.
I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.

participant_2.background:
My goal is to be a great teacher and inspire my students to be the best they can be.
I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.
I do not care about the weather as long as I can play video games.
I'm a creative person who loves to make my own clothes and play board games.
I collect cat-themed items because they bring me joy and remind me of my favorite animal.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hi! I'm doing great, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks! I just got back from a trip to Japan.
Oh wow! That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Japan. What was it like?
It was incredible! The food was amazing, the people were so friendly, and the culture was so different from anything I've ever experienced before.
That sounds like an amazing trip! I'm so jealous!
It was definitely one of the best experiences of my life.
I'm sure it was! I'm definitely going to have to put Japan on my bucket list now.
I highly recommend it!
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, make my own clothes, and play board games.
Oh cool! I love video games too! What's your favorite game?
Right now, I'm really into Elden Ring.
Oh nice! I've heard a lot of good things about that game.
It's really good! It's a challenging game, but it's also really rewarding.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher.
Oh cool! What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten.
Oh nice! I bet that's a lot of fun.
It is! I love working with kids.
That's awesome! It sounds like you have a really great job.
I do! I'm really lucky.
I'm glad to hear that
